com.cyc.query

Interface ProofView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProofViewNode, QueryAnswerExplanation

    public interface ProofView
extends ProofViewNode, QueryAnswerExplanation
    An explanation for a specific answer to a query, expressed as a tree of ProofViewNodes. In general they are intended to be rendered in an interactive display, with CycL and/or NL (encoded in HTML) for nodes, and with their children displayed or hidden according to user actions or preferences.

    A ProofView instance is also a ProofViewNode, and serves as the root of the tree. A suggested rendering algorithm would be to display this node, and recurse on all child nodes for whom ProofViewNode.isExpandInitially() returns true.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.cyc.query.ProofViewNode
